title: 21: Let's Talk Pot Stocks
description:
Host Alex Eule is joined by Barron's senior writer Bill Alpert to talk about the hottest topic in stock investing: pot.

The Readback is a weekly, financial podcast from Barron's. Hosted by Alex Eule and produced by Mette Lützhøft.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
